directions: Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat.  Add onion, garlic, curry, and cumin; saute, stirring often, until onion is soft and fragrant.
Stir in apples, pumpkin, broth, water, and sugar.  Bring to a boil, stirring often.  Cover, and reduce heat to low.  Simmer for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Puree soup in a food processor or a blender.
Return soup to saucepan; reheat, covered, over low heat.
ingredients: 4 Macintosh apples - peeled, cored and chopped
title: Curried Pumpkin Soup
